paper_abstract: The pancake problem asks for the minimum number of prefix reversals sufficient for sorting any permutation of length n. We improve the upper bound for the pancake problem to (18/11)n + O(1) approximate to (1.6363)n. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An (18/11)n upper bound for sorting by prefix reversals
